Source.Name: python-decoratortools
Source.Summary: Use class and function decorators - even in Python 2.3 - now with source debugging for generated code
Source.Description: python-decoratortools provides decorator facilities for Python 2.3 and above. It provides classes and functions decorators.DecoratorTools is part of the PEAK (Python Enterprise Architecture Kit) framework and provides the peak.util.decorators module.
